page.title: 04Transport in Vernham Dean CP
page.content: Although the area is very rural and sparsely populated, it is served by a thrice daily private bus service, monday to saturday, with no sunday service. The service, which completes a loop around the area, is mainly used by children and students attending schools in the local villages or the schools or the college in Andover and is thus heavily subsidised by Hampshire County Council. The current cost of a return journey to Andover is Â£2.40. In addition to the bus service, Andover has an extensive taxi service, which will serve the area, but because of the distance involved tends to be very expensive. The only other form of transport is the private car. Most households have at least one car, with a considerable number possessing two cars.
